title: OmniSense - AI Prediction Market Analysis
description: Built multi-agent AI orchestration platform using Next.js and Claude 4.5 with 5 specialized agents (Planner, Researcher, Critic, Analyst, Reporter). Processes 20+ real-time web sources via Valyu search and RAG, applying custom Bayesian probability aggregation to deliver institutional-grade prediction market analysis in <9 minutes.

title: CityTraffic NLQ and Analytics
description: Built distributed analytics platform with geohash-based sharding (RF=3) and LLM-powered query interface, achieving P95 latency <600ms for spatio-temporal queries across 2M+ NYC traffic records using MongoDB Vector Search and natural language processing.

title: Code Completion Models Comparative Analysis
description: Implemented and evaluated LSTM, BERT, and CodeGPT-small-java models for Java code completion using PyTorch on 10K+ GitHub repositories, achieving Top-K accuracy benchmarks across multiple context windows (64-256 tokens) for statistical machine learning research.

title: BuildMyWeb - Image to HTML/CSS Converter
description: Developed a CV pipeline to convert hand-drawn wireframes into HTML/CSS using OpenCV and custom TensorFlow CNN+CTC model, achieving 95% text recognition accuracy. Created React-based editor for real-time UI customization, cutting prototyping time by 30%.

title: Smart Driving Assistance System
description: Co-authored Springer Nature publication on driver assistance system with lane detection achieving 95%+ reliability. Trained YOLO + CNN models on GTSRB dataset to 90%+ accuracy for traffic sign recognition with integrated voice alerts for real-world deployment.
